subdisciplines.name: Moral Development
subdisciplines.description: The study of how individuals develop moral reasoning and behavior throughout their lifespan.

subdisciplines.name: Moral Cognition
subdisciplines.description: The study of how individuals perceive, process, and remember moral information.

subdisciplines.name: Moral Emotions
subdisciplines.description: The study of how individuals experience and express moral emotions such as guilt, shame, and moral elevation.
